divs: sighting detailsi have had many ufo sightings, but i have never had one like this. very difficult to describe with words- and could not get a photo because camera was downstairs at that time). 7:13 am, 12-12-2012, my dog wanted to go utside. opened back door to let him out, and noticed an extremely brilliant, white v-shaped object (which must have been quite large, as it was as large as a penny at an outstretched arm's length and it also appeared quite large as well!), moving much more rapidly than an airplane, a jet, or anything else i've seen in the sky............now here is the difficult-to-explain part. it was as though the "trail" that the v-shaped object (bright white) left behind it was holographic.............(in other words- no chemtrail......but, rather like "distortions" of the sky with small, different colored "dots" or "flashes" in it's wake.) i really don't know how else to describe this, except to say "think of a holograph and how it looks when turned in the light." approximately 40 seconds from w sky until i could no longer wee it going e. very fast. very hologrpahic. and very strange! i was amazed to see something this unusual......never saw a holographic flying object before! it was not a meteor\comet\airplane\jet\asteroid\planet\star......it was a triangle which glowed extremely bright white, with holographic aspects. very strange- but exciting to see!
Summary: Extremely bright white holographic triangle moving very fast W to E
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Flushing
There were no other sightings in Flushing on or around December 12th 2012
